    public class RiderManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    RiderManager handles Teams and Riders and their respective interactions.

      • createRider

        public int createRider​(int teamID,
                       java.lang.String name,
                       int yearOfBirth)
                throws IDNotRecognisedException,
                       java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        teamID - int - A team Id that the rider will belong too. If the ID doesn't exist IDNotRecognisedException is thrown.
        name - String - A name for the rider, Has to be non-null or IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        yearOfBirth - int - A year that the rider was born in. Has to be above 1900 or IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Returns:
        riderId of the rider created.
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - teamId int - If the ID doesn't exist IDNotRecognisedException is thrown.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - yearOfBirth int - A year that the rider was born in. Has to be above 1900 or IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

      • removeRider

        public void removeRider​(int riderId)
                 throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Parameters:
        riderId - int - A riderId of a rider to be removed. If the ID doesn't exist IDNotRecognisedException is thrown.
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - riderId int - If the ID doesn't exist IDNotRecognisedException is thrown.

      • getIndexForRiderId

        public int getIndexForRiderId​(int riderId)
                       throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Parameters:
        riderId - int - A riderId of a rider to be searced for. If the ID doesn't exist IDNotRecognisedException is thrown.
        Returns:
        An int which is the index that maps to the riderId.
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - riderId int - If the ID doesn't exist IDNotRecognisedException is thrown.

      • createTeam

        public int createTeam​(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String description)
               throws IllegalNameException,
                      InvalidNameException
        Parameters:
        name - String - A name for the team, , If the name is null, empty, has more than 30 characters, or has white spaces will throw InvaildNameException.
        description - String - A description for the team.
        Throws:
        IllegalNameException - name String - Is a duplicate name of any other Team, IllegalNameException will be thrown.
        InvailNameException - name String - If the name is null, empty, has more than 30 characters, or has white spaces will throw InvaildNameException.
        InvalidNameException
